columns.name: id
columns.description: An identification of a property of the associated Physical Asset property or Physical Asset class property.

columns.name: description
columns.description: Contains additional information and descriptions of the property.

columns.name: value
columns.description: The value, set of values, or range of the property.

columns.name: valueUnitOfMeasure
columns.description: The unit of measure of the associated property values.

columns.name: quantity
columns.description: Specifies the anount of Physical Asset resource required.

columns.name: quantityUnitOfMeasure
columns.description: The unit of measure of the associated quantity.

columns.name: externalreferenceid
columns.description: Reference ID of an external dicitonary, meta-model or ontology

contents.name: contains

contents.description: A cross-model dependency to element in the physical asset model as explained in Clause 3.3.8
